com.ssdd.main

Class MainSupervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.main.MainSupervisor

  • public class MainSupervisor
extends java.lang.Object
    main class to manage critical sections supervisor tasks (restart, ntp, log time adjustement, ...)

      • restartCs

        private static void restartCs(int numNodes,
                              java.lang.String[] servers)
        restarts the critical section service in each server
        Parameters:
        numNodes - number of processes tath will handle the critical section
        servers - where the critical section service is deployed

      • sampleNtp

        private static void sampleNtp(java.lang.String file,
                              java.lang.String[] servers)
        obtains a number of pairs for the NTP algorithm for each given server and stores it into the given file. If the file exists, merges the obtained pairs with the ones stored in the file.
        Parameters:
        file - empty or containing the association between list of ntp calculated pairs and server's ip.
        servers - to sample the NTP t1 and t2 times from

      • correctLogs

        private static void correctLogs(java.lang.String ntpFile,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> logAndServer)
        adds the offset to the time column in given logs.
        Parameters:
        logAndServer - map with the association of log file and server (ip)
        ntpFile - file containing the association between list of ntp calculated pairs and server's ip.

      • buildNtpClient

        public static NTPClient buildNtpClient(java.lang.String[] servers)
        builds and NTPClient with the servers' ips.
        Parameters:
        servers - servers to request the time in the NTP protocol
        Returns:
        a NTPClient build with the servers

      • loadNtpSamples

        private static java.util.Map<NTPService,Pair[]> loadNtpSamples(java.lang.String file)
        loads a map with the association of server and associated list of NTP Pairs (delay, offset).
        Parameters:
        file - where the map is stored in the java native serialization format
        Returns:
        the described map

      • storeNtpSamples

        private static void storeNtpSamples(java.lang.String file,
                                    java.util.Map<NTPService,Pair[]> samples)
        stores into a file a map with the association of server and list of NTP Pairs (delay, offset), in the java native serialization format.
        Parameters:
        samples - the map to store
        file - where the map is stored in the java native serialization format

        Parameters:
